mods.name: rm_Total_Moose_Experience
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Contains almost all of my mods into one mod. Infused Chaos not included.

mods.name: rm_Angry_Moose
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Mixes some creatures from all maps into all maps, in limited and/or balanced weights. Cubs, Crocodiles, Jaguars, Cougars, Tuskers, Dracs, Shaggy Zebra, and Strikers included. Extremely low chance for some workshop animals in limited areas on OLY & STYX. Added more Exotic Infused creatures to Prometheus. Spawn balances, and MORE balances. Now with +25% more creatures.

mods.name: rm_Buffs_and_Bundles
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Minor tweaks to a few buffs.  Bundles size improvements.

mods.name: rm_Bulk_Recipes
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Adds bulk recipes for many processor recipes and more.

mods.name: rm_Caveworm_Exotics
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Adds 10% for Caveworms to drop a low amount of Exotics.  This is NOT meant to be any sort of farm.

mods.name: rm_Durability
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Increased durability of workshop items, wind turbines, wall defenses.

mods.name: rm_Exotics_Farm
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Olympus: 6 to 8 veins, all veins locations possible, 300-600 each vein.  Styx & Prometheus: 6 to 8 veins, all vein locations possible, 400-600 exotics each vein, 400-800 red exotics each vein.

mods.name: rm_Infused_Chaos
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Vanilla spawn tables, except everything will be infused.  It WILL be painful.

mods.name: rm_Meta_Attachment
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Now including Fillable modifications.  Adds attachments to workshop armor, and some tools/weapons.  Adds station repair option to some items.  Allows workshop power source to recharge via Charging Station.  TESTING: Return to orbit.  Minor oxygen and canteen capacity increases.  Some battery powered tool capacity increases.

mods.name: rm_Moar_Power
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Wind Turbine output: 2250.   Solar Panel output: 8000.

mods.name: rm_Modifiers
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Increased aura radius, including talents, pet talents, and dehumidifiers.  Team Modules effect user.  Exotic Debuff tweaked.

mods.name: rm_No_Ore_Left_Behind
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Changes the Waste Not talent to give additional ore instead of stone.  Provides a chance for Exotics when mining Platinum & Titanium.

mods.name: rm_Shifting_Winds
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Prometheus weather variety expanded.  Mixed in weather events from other biomes.

mods.name: rm_Stack_Sizes
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Many improved stack sizes over vanilla.

mods.name: rm_Tracker
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: For those who want to know how many Dracs they've killed and beyond.  50+ previously untracked items included.  Tracks kills for nearly every creature in the game.  Tracks all buildables crafted, and all decorations crafted.  Half of these values are only visible if you open your Accolades.json file itself and scroll to the bottom: <Drive:>:\Users\<user>\AppData\Local\Icarus\Saved\PlayerData\<17 digits>

mods.name: rm_True_Level
mods.author: relentlessmoose
mods.description: Displays all characters true levels beyond 60.  Displays all pet/tame true levels.  Displays true NPC creature levels (if applicable).  Increases tame max level to 100, allowing all talent points.  DOES NOT add Prospector talent points.
